Lamia:

Lamia obeyed  and flew towards the large crashed thing


From: Pres=
ton Carroll 
Sent: Sunday, April 11, 2010 7:33 PM
To: nbwrpg@...=
m 
Subject: Re: Rebuilding the minions!


  
Who: VENOM, CHOPSHOP, Lamia
Lo=
cation: In transit - from Minion Earth Base

> Lamia used her own anti-grav=
 engines and follow them

Venom took the lead with Chopshop and Lamia flyin=
g just behind. As
they flew over the rather large island all that could be =
seen was the
ruin of volcanic activity. While the ground was relatively saf=
e for
mechanical life, its searing temperatures and poisonous gasses were
d=
eadly to any biological life that was unlucky enough to be trapped
here.

H=
owever quickly enough their trip took them out into the more
temperate open=
 oceans, the harsh blacks, reds and browns of molten
stone giving way to th=
e beautiful blues, greens and browns of the open
oceans. Occasionally a lar=
ge fish or oceanic life could be seen
leaping from the waters as the trio f=
lew over it.

Soon enough though they came back over land, the oceans crash=
ed into
tall cliffs, which quickly turned into trees and underbrush as they=

flew on.

"There!" came Venom's voice as they flew. He pointed to a large
=
clearing where it seemed that something large had crashed.

"Lamia!" Venom'=
s voice came through clearly over the radio,
"Investigate that, and tell me=
 what you find." His voice imperious and
almost disdainful.

(TAG)

Preston=
